import React from "react"; import { Container, Row, Col, Image } from "react-bootstrap"; import birthday from "../../assets/work-images/Birthday-Clock-350x219.png"; import news from "../../assets/work-images/News-Flash-350x219.png"; import weather from "../../assets/work-images/Weather-Dashboard-350x219.png"; import workday from "../../assets/work-images/Work-Day-Scheduler-350x219.png"; import amazon from "../../assets/work-images/Amazon-Clone-Home-350x219.png"; const styles = { caption: { color: "white", textAlign: "center" }, buttonPrimary: { color: "white", backgroundColor: "rgb(30, 8, 153)", fontSize: "28px", marginLeft: "5px", marginRight: "5px", marginTop: "45px", }, }; // additional styling in styles/styles.css function Work() { return (
Amazon Clone is a full-stack e-commerce application.
It's built with React, Firebase and Stripe.
See the repo
See it deployed
News Flash gathers news based on the user's news category preferences.
It's built with JavaScript. It uses APIs, bootstrap and local storage.
See the repo
See it deployed
Weather Dashboard provides weather data for any city in the world.
It's built with JavaScript. It uses APIs, bootstrap and local storage.
See the repo
See it deployed
Tick Tock Birthday Clock is a place to create and share birthday wishlists.
It's built with JavaScript. It uses mysql, bcrypt, dotenv, express, handlebars, bootstrap, session and sequelize.
See the repo
See it deployed
Workday Scheduler is a day planner.
It's built with JavaScript. It uses moment.js, bootstrap and local storage.
See the repo
See it deployed
); } export default Work;
